title: Fastest Business Licensing Process
description: In 2019, Poland had one of the quickest processes for obtaining an operating license, taking only 1.2 days on average.

title: Perfect Female Primary Education Completion
description: In 2021, Poland achieved a 100% persistence rate for females reaching the last grade of primary education.

title: Low Prevalence of Child Stunting
description: By 2024, only 1% of children under five in Poland were affected by stunting, indicating excellent child nutrition and health.

title: Minimal Health Expenditure-Induced Poverty
description: In 2020, only 0.01% of Poland's population was pushed further below the $3.65 poverty line due to out-of-pocket health care costs.
